import{APICore}from'./apiCore';var api=new APICore();// account
function login(params){var baseUrl='/login/';return api.create("".concat(baseUrl),params);}function logout(){var baseUrl='/logout/';return api.create("".concat(baseUrl),{});}function signup(params){var baseUrl='/register/';return api.create("".concat(baseUrl),params);}function forgotPassword(params){var baseUrl='/forget-password/';return api.create("".concat(baseUrl),params);}export{login,logout,signup,forgotPassword};
